6157.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|92|58$رَبَّهُم|their Lord|83|128|3649$بِهِمْ|about them,|101|146|125$يَوْمَئِذٍ|that Day,|83|128|3485$لَّخَبِيرُۢ|(is) surely All-Aware.|159|181|14396$

6160.verse: وَمَآ|And what|83|118|46$أَدْرَٮٰكَ|will make you know|147|217|17213$مَا|what|53|123|262$ٱلْقَارِعَةُ|(is) the Striking Calamity?|191|226|18297$

6162.verse: وَتَكُونُ|And will be|91|139|17311$ٱلْجِبَالُ|the mountains|114|210|9461$كَٱلْعِهْنِ|like wool,|90|186|17312$ٱلْمَنفُوشِ|fluffed up.|103|151|18300$

6163.verse: فَأَمَّا|Then as for|96|144|265$مَن|(him) whose|101|197|76$ثَقُلَتْ|are heavy|86|182|6258$مَوَٲزِينُهُۥ|his scales,|113|161|6259$

6165.verse: وَأَمَّا|But as for|85|137|269$مَنْ|(him) whose|101|205|76$خَفَّتْ|are light|74|178|6260$مَوَٲزِينُهُۥ|his scales,|113|165|6259$

6175.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|94|293$لَتَرَوُنَّهَا|surely you will see it|155|237|18310$عَيْنَ|(with the) eye|116|198|14218$ٱلْيَقِينِ|(of) certainty.|115|156|16627$

6176.verse: vum~a⚓Then,⚓CONJ|LEM:vum~★latuso_#alun~a⚓surely you will be asked⚓ V|IMPF|PASS|LEM:sa>ala|ROOT:sAl|2MP★yawoma}i*K⚓that Day⚓ T|LEM:yawoma}i*★Eani⚓about⚓ P|LEM:Ean★{ln~aEiymi⚓the pleasures.⚓ N|LEM:naEiym|ROOT:nEm|M|GEN★

6156.verse: And that within the breasts is obtained,

6157.verse: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.

6160.verse: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?

6161.verse: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

6162.verse: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.

6163.verse: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],

6164.verse: He will be in a pleasant life.

6165.verse: But as for one whose scales are light,

6166.verse: His refuge will be an abyss.

6167.verse: And what can make you know what that is?

6168.verse: It is a Fire, intensely hot.

6171.verse: No! You are going to know.

6172.verse: Then no! You are going to know.

6173.verse: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...

6174.verse: You will surely see the Hellfire.

6175.verse: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

6176.verse: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.
